title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.23 - Stock certificates of licensees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.23 - Stock certificates of licensees

State Regulations

Each licensed harness racing association or corporation
issuing stock must imprint upon the face of each certificate of stock plainly
and prominently the following: "This certificate of stock is transferable only subject
to the provisions of section 303 of Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding

Law."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4101.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
